about_the_game:
Step into the electrifying future of racing with Cyber Clutch: Hot Import Nights. This online multiplayer game blends high-speed racing with intense vehicle combat, set against a backdrop of vivid cyberpunk landscapes. Select from a variety of cars, each equipped with unique weapons and characteristics, and battle it out in neon-lit urban environments.
The game focuses on skillful driving, strategic combat, and vehicle customization, offering a thrilling and unique experience on the digital racetrack. Prepare to outdrive, outgun, and outsmart your opponents in this adrenaline-pumping racing adventure.


DIVE INTO THE HEART OF CYBER COMBAT

Experience the thrill across various distinct, futuristic environments. Each arena is designed not just for racing, but for high-intensity vehicular battles that test your skills and strategies.


COMBAT RACING

Choose from a variety of unique cars, each with its own set of weapons and distinctive identity. Master the art of drifting to charge your arsenal or harness the power of pickups to gain an edge over your opponents.

THE CARS

Cars reflect your style and tactics. Choose from light, medium, and heavy classes, each with unique themes. Medium cars like the satellite-equipped Echo balance durability and speed, while light cars such as the Bulldog prioritize agility. The heavy class, led by the Beast, offers unmatched power. Enhance your vehicle with extensive customization options using earned carbon credits. Each race in this vibrant cyber world is a showcase of your tailored racing identity.

content_descriptors.notes:
HIN: Cyber Clutch is an online vehicle combat game set in a futuristic, cyberpunk world. Players will need to shoot other cars. Vehicles in combat may display visual effects like (weapon) fire. There are no actual drivers in the cars thus no humans will be harmed in this game.
There are no depictions of human injury, death, or explicit content such as sexual acts, drug and alcohol abuse, or self-harm. This game focuses on strategic vehicle combat in a fictional setting.

detailed_description:
Digital Deluxe Edition


The Overdrive Edition offers two exclusive vehicles: the Wasp and the Scythe. Both come with unique holographic parts unavailable for any other vehicle in the game. It's the perfect way to stand out in races.

Buy the Overdrive Edition and get:

  • 2 Exlusive vehicles; The Wasp & The Scythe
  • 12 exclusive parts per vehicle
  • 7 Unique rims that can be used for all vehicles

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit version only)
  • Processor: Intel i5 7400 @ 3GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11 (64bit version only)
  • Processor: Ryzen 7 2700 X @ 3.7GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Immerse in a multiplayer world where high-speed racing blends with intense vehicle combat. Choose from a variety of uniquely armed cars for strategic battles across vivid cyberpunk cities, focusing on skillful driving and deep customization.
